snippet: The Barrington Stage Company in Pittsfield, Mass., has announced its 2012 season, including a new play from Mark St. Germain titled “Dr. Ruth, All the Way.”
abstract: Barrington Stage Company in Pittsfield, Massachusetts, announces its 2012 season, which includes Mark St Germain play Dr Ruth, All the Way, chronicling the life of sex therapist Ruth Westheimer; other shows noted.
lead_paragraph: The Barrington Stage Company in Pittsfield, Mass., has announced its 2012 season, including a new play from Mark St. Germain titled “Dr. Ruth, All the Way.”
